TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TileBrush extends System.Windows.Media.Brush
Public MustInherit Class TileBrush Inherits Brush
public ref class TileBrush abstract : System::Windows::Media::Brush
.class public auto ansi abstract TileBrush extends System.Windows.Media.Brush

summary.span: 描述使用一个或多个图块绘制区域的方法。

span.span: Describes a way to paint a region by using one or more tiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的派生类 定义用于绘制区域的磁贴的内容。The derived classes of define the contents of the tiles that you use to paint a region. 例如，使用 类通过使用图像绘制区域。For example, use the class to paint an area by using an image. 使用 来控制如何绘制区域。Use a to control how you paint an area. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 提供多种类型的画笔：For example, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] provides several types of brushes: - 若要使用图像进行绘制，请使用 。To paint by using an image, use the . - 若要通过绘制进行绘制，请使用 。To paint by drawing, use the . - 若要使用 进行绘制，请使用 。To paint by using a , use the . 当你使用 来绘制区域，而不是使用单个拉伸图像绘制区域，则可以使用一系列创建模式的图像磁贴来绘制区域。When you use the to paint an area, instead of painting an area by using a single stretched image, you can paint an area by using a series of image tiles that create a pattern. 使用 绘制区域时，需要使用以下三个组件： "内容"、"磁贴" 和 "输出区域"。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 下图显示了这三个 组件之间的关系。The following illustrations show how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 组件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") 具有单个图块的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![已平铺的 TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "平铺 TileBrush 的组成部分")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 已指定图块的 TileMode 的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile **内容**： 可以有不同类型的内容：**Content**: A can have different types of content: - 如果画笔为 ，则此内容为图像。If the brush is an , this content is an image. 属性指定 的内容。The property specifies the contents of the . - 如果画笔为 ，则此内容为绘图。If the brush is a , this content is a drawing. 属性指定 的内容。The property specifies the contents of the . - 如果画笔为 ，则此内容为视觉对象。If the brush is a , this content is a visual. 属性指定 的内容。The property specifies the content of the . 可以通过使用 属性指定 内容的位置和尺寸。You can specify the position and dimensions of content by using the property. **磁贴**：一个 生成一个或多个图块。**Tiles**: A produces one or more tiles. 默认情况下，画笔的内容会拉伸以填充单个磁贴，并拉伸该磁贴来填充输出区域。By default, the content of the brush is stretched to fill a single tile and that tile is stretched to fill the output area. 属性用于指定 的基本图块的大小和位置。The property is used to specify the size and position of the base tile for the . 属性确定 的大小和位置是相对于输出区域（默认行为）还是绝对值。The property determines whether the size and position of the are relative to the output area (the default behavior) or whether they are absolute values. **输出区域**：输出区域是画笔绘制的区域，如 的 或 的 。**Output Area**: The output area is the area that the brush paints, such as the of an or the of a . 有关 类的详细信息，请参阅[利用图像、绘图和视觉对象进行绘制](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals)。For more information about the class, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-images-drawings-and-visuals) . ## Freezable 功能Freezable Features 是 类型。A is a type. 关于功能，例如冻结和克隆，请参阅[Freezable 对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)。For information about features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).

para.span: 有关从 类型继承的详细信息，请参阅 "[冻结对象概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview)"。

span.span: For more information about inheriting from types, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置 基本磁贴中内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of content in the base tile.

value.span: 用于指定 内容在其基本磁贴中水平位置的值。

span.span: A value that specifies the horizontal position of content in its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果满足以下任一条件，则将使用 的 和 属性：The and properties of a are used when either of the following conditions is true: - 属性为 或 ，并且 和 具有不同的纵横比。The property is or and the and have different aspect ratios. - 属性为 ， 和 的大小不同。The property is and the and are different sizes. 请注意，使用 属性指定 内容的尺寸;使用 属性指定 基本图块的位置和大小。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，克隆对象的 属性仍会返回

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可生成只读 对象的可修改副本。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 为方便起见，此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 此方法复制依赖项属性时，它将复制资源引用和数据绑定，不过它们可能不再解析。When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings although they might no longer resolve. 它不复制动画或其当前值。It does not copy animations or their current values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Stretch Stretch { System::Windows::Media::Stretch get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Stretch value); };
member this.Stretch : System.Windows.Media.Stretch with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，它指定此 的内容如何拉伸才适合其磁贴。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the content of this stretches to fit its tiles.

value.span: 指定此 内容如何投影到其基本磁贴的值。

span.span: A value that specifies how this content is projected onto its base tile.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性接受以下值， 枚举将定义这些值：The property accepts the following values, which the enumeration defines: - ： 内容不会拉伸以填充磁贴。: The content does not stretch to fill the tile. - ：缩放 内容以适应磁贴尺寸。: The content is scaled to fit the tile dimensions. 但是，会保留内容的纵横比。However, the aspect ratio of the content is preserved. - ：缩放 内容，使其完全填充输出区域，但保留其原始纵横比。: The content is scaled so that it completely fills the output area but preserves its original aspect ratio. - ：缩放 内容以适应磁贴。: The content is scaled to fit the tile. 由于内容的高度和宽度独立进行缩放，因此内容的原始纵横比可能不会保留。Because the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the content might not be preserved. 也就是说，为了完全填充输出磁贴， 内容可能会失真。That is, the content might be distorted in order to completely fill the output tile. 下图演示了不同的 设置。The following image illustrates the different settings. ![不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush 拉伸设置")![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") 不同的拉伸设置Different stretch settings 请注意，使用 属性指定 内容的尺寸;使用 属性指定 基本图块的位置和大小。Note that you specify the dimensions of content by using the property; you specify the position and size of the base tile by using the property. ## Viewbox 剪辑Viewbox Clipping 永远不会将 内容剪切到 中。 contents are never clipped to the . 但 内容*将被*剪裁到 的边缘，这会设置 基本图块的尺寸。However, contents *are* clipped to the edges of the , which sets the dimensions for the base tile. 下图显示了不同 设置对其 小于其 的 的影响。The following illustration shows the effect of different settings on a that has a that is smaller than its . 位于 之外的图像部分将呈灰色。The parts of the image that are outside the are tinted gray. ![具有不同 Stretch 设置的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") 具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrushTileBrush with different Stretch settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::TileMode TileMode { System::Windows::Media::TileMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::TileMode value); };
member this.TileMode : System.Windows.Media.TileMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定在基本图块小于输出区时 如何填充你正在绘画的区域。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies how a fills the area that you are painting if the base tile is smaller than the output area.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定在 属性指定的基本图块小于输出区域时 图块如何填充输出区域的值。

span.span: A value that specifies how the tiles fill the output area when the base tile, which is specified by the property, is smaller than the output area.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了不同的平铺模式，这些模式由 枚举定义。The following illustration shows the different tile modes, which are defined by the enumeration. ![不同的 TileBrush System.windows.media.tilemode> 设置](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "不同的 TileBrush TileMode 设置")![Different TileBrush TileMode settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-tilemodes.gif "Different TileBrush TileMode settings") System.windows.media.tilemode> 枚举的可用磁贴模式Available tile modes for the TileMode enumeration 若要使 属性有效果，必须将画笔的 设置为小于要绘制的区域的大小（输出区域）。For the property to have an effect, you must set the for the brush to a size that is smaller than the area that you are painting (the output area). 如果 大小等于或超过输出区域，则画笔将生成单个磁贴来展开以填充输出区域，且不会出现任何图块模式。If the size is equal to or exceeds the output area, the brush produces a single tile that expands to fill the output area, and no tile pattern occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置 图块中内容的位置和尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the content in a tile.
The position and dimensions of the content.

value.span: 默认值为矩形 ()，其 为 (0,0)， 和 为 1。

span.span: The default value is a rectangle () that has a of (0,0), and a and of 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 绘制区域时，需要使用以下三个组件： "内容"、"磁贴" 和 "输出区域"。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 属性指定 内容的大小和位置。The property specifies the size and position of content. 下图显示了这三个 组件之间的关系。The following illustration shows how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 组件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") TileBrush 组件TileBrush components ![已平铺的 TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "平铺 TileBrush 的组成部分")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 属性确定 值是解释为相对值还是绝对值。The property determines whether the value is interpreted as a relative or absolute value. 默认情况下， 属性设置为 。By default, the property is set to . ## Viewbox 剪辑Viewbox Clipping 永远不会将 内容剪切到 中。 contents are never clipped to the . 但 内容*将被*剪裁到 的边缘，这会设置基本图块的值。However, contents *are* clipped to the edges of the , which sets the values for the base tile. 下图显示了不同 设置对其 小于其 的 的影响。The following illustration shows the effect of different settings on a that has a that is smaller than its . 位于 之外的图像部分将呈灰色。The parts of the image that are outside the are tinted gray. ![具有不同 Stretch 设置的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with different Stretch settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-clipping.png "TileBrush with different Stretch settings") 具有不同拉伸设置的 TileBrushTileBrush with different Stretch settings ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 可以通过使用 属性指定 内容的大小和位置。You can specify the size and position of content by using the property. 属性确定 值是相对于 内容的边界，还是绝对值。The property determines whether the value is relative to the bounds of the content or whether it is an absolute value. 第一个插图显示 100 x 100 像素的图像，然后使用此图像显示不同 属性设置的效果。The first illustration shows a 100 by 100 pixel image and then uses this image to show the effects of different property settings. ![图像](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-sampleimage.jpg "图像")![An image](~/add/media/graphicsmm-viewbox-sampleimage.jpg "An image") 开始示例图像（100 x 100 与设备无关的像素）Beginning sample image (100 by 100 device independent pixels) 下图显示了使用0.0，0.0，0.25，0.5 的 的输出。The following illustration shows the output of a that uses a of 0.0,0.0, 0.25,0.5. 其他相关属性值包括：Other relevant property values include the following: - ： （默认值）: (default) - : 0,0,1,1: 0,0,1,1 - : : - , : , : 下图显示了几个不同的 属性设置。This illustration shows several different property settings. 属性确定 如何拉伸其 以填充其 。The property determines how a stretches its to fill its . ![Viewbox 为0，0 0.25，0.5 的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-0-0-025-05-viewbox.png "Viewbox 为 0,0 0.25,0.5 的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0,0 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-0-0-025-05-viewbox.png "TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0,0 0.25,0.5") TileBrush，其相对 Viewbox 为0.0，0.0，0.25，0。5TileBrush with a relative Viewbox of 0.0,0.0, 0.25,0.5 下图显示了类似的 ，但其相对 为0.5，0.25，0.25，0.5。The next illustration shows a similar but with a relative of 0.5,0.25, 0.25,0.5. ![Viewbox 为0.5，0.25 0.25，0.5 的 TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox.png "Viewbox 为 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 的 TileBrush")![TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox.png "TileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5") 类似 TileBrush，但具有不同的 Viewbox 设置Similar TileBrush but with a different Viewbox setting 下图显示了相同的 ，但其相对 值为0.0，0.0，0.5，0.5， 的 。The next illustration shows the same but with a relative value of 0.0,0.0, 0.5,0.5 and a of . ![Viewbox 为0.5，0.25 0.25，0.5 的 TiledTileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox-tiled.png "Viewbox 为 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5 的 TiledTileBrush")![TiledTileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5](~/add/media/graphicsmm-05-0-025-05-viewbox-tiled.png "TiledTileBrush with a Viewbox of 0.5,0.25 0.25,0.5") 类似 TileBrush，但带有平铺和不同视区设置Similar TileBrush but with tiling and a different Viewport setting 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 为0.5，0.25，0.25，0.5 的平铺 。The following example shows how to create a tiled that has a of 0.5,0.25, 0.25,0.5. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 值是相对于 内容的边界框而言，还是绝对值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the value is relative to the bounding box of the contents or whether the value is absolute.

value.span: 一个值，该值指示 值是相对于 内容的边界框而言，还是绝对值。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the value is relative to the bounding box of the contents or whether it is an absolute value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值 指示 相对于内容的边界框。A value of indicates that the are relative to the bounding box of the content. 请注意，的值 指定与设备无关的设备独立像素，而不是设备像素。Note that a value of specifies device independent pixels instead of device pixels, which are device dependent. 因此，当 的值应用时，每个像素表示一英寸的 1/96th 每。Therefore, when a value of applies, each pixel represents 1/96th of an inch. 指定具有 作为其源的 的 时，必须记住此像素差别。You must remember this pixel distinction when you specify the of an that has a as its source. 例如，使用标准像素作为度量值时，如果图像分辨率为每英寸300点，则 300 x 300 像素的图像宽度只是宽度的一英寸。For example, when you use the standard pixel as a measure, a 300 by 300 pixel image is only one inch in width if the image resolution is 300 dots per inch. 但是，如果要设置一个绝对值，则必须将 设置为（0，0，96，96），以便包含整个映像。However, when you want to set an absolute value, you must set the to (0, 0, 96, 96) in order to include the whole image. 可以通过使用 属性指定 内容的大小和位置。You can specify the size and position of content by using the property. 属性确定 值是相对于 内容的边界，还是绝对值。The property determines whether the value is relative to the bounds of the content or whether it is an absolute value. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ViewboxUnitsProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Rect Viewport { System::Windows::Rect get(); void set(System::Windows::Rect value); };
member this.Viewport : System.Windows.Rect with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的基本图块的位置和尺寸。

span.span: Gets or sets the position and dimensions of the base tile for a .

value.span: 的基本图块的位置和尺寸。

span.span: The position and dimensions of the base tile for a .

value.span: 默认值是一个矩形 ()，其 为 (0,0)，其 和 为 1。

span.span: The default value is a rectangle () with a of (0,0) and a and of 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 绘制区域时，需要使用以下三个组件： "内容"、"磁贴" 和 "输出区域"。When you paint an area by using a , you use three components: content, tiles, and the output area. 下图显示了这三个 组件之间的关系。The following illustration shows how these three components relate to each other. ![TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush 组件")![TileBrush components](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-defaultcontentprojection2.png "TileBrush components") 具有单个图块的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a single tile ![已平铺的 TileBrush 组件](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "平铺 TileBrush 的组成部分")![Components of a tiled TileBrush](~/add/media/graphicsmm-tiledprojection.png "Components of a tiled TileBrush") 已指定图块的 TileMode 的 TileBrush 的组成部分Components of a TileBrush with a TileMode of Tile 属性确定磁贴在 中的大小和位置。The property determines the size and position of the tiles in a . 默认情况下， 具有单个磁贴，该磁贴将填充整个输出区域。By default, a has a single tile that fills the whole output area. 属性控制 内容如何适应该磁贴。The property controls how the content fits into that tile. 您可以使用 属性覆盖此默认行为并指定磁贴大小。You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the property. 使用 属性来指定 是使用绝对坐标还是相对坐标。Use the property to specify whether the uses absolute or relative coordinates. 如果坐标是相对坐标，则它们相对于输出区域的大小。If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area. 点（0，0）表示输出区域的左上角，（1，1）表示输出区域的右下角。The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area. 若要指定 属性使用绝对坐标，请将 属性设置为 ""。To specify that the property uses absolute coordinates, set the property to . 下图显示了将 的 属性设置为相对或绝对时的输出差异。The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the property of a to either relative or absolute. ![绝对和相对视区单元](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "绝对和相对视区单位")![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") 相对和绝对 System.windows.media.tilebrush.viewportunitsRelative and absolute ViewportUnits ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置 枚举，该枚举指定 的值（该值指示 基本图块的大小和位置）是否是相对于输出区域的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumeration that specifies whether the value of the , which indicates the size and position of the base tile, is relative to the size of the output area.

value.span: 指示 的值（该值用于描述 磁贴的大小和位置）是否是相对于整体输出区域的大小。

span.span: Indicates whether the value of the , which describes the size and position of the tiles, is relative to the size of the whole output area.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定磁贴在 中的大小和位置。The property determines the size and position of the tiles in a . 默认情况下， 具有单个磁贴，该磁贴将填充整个输出区域。By default, a has a single tile that fills the whole output area. 属性控制 内容如何适应该磁贴。The property controls how the content fits into that tile. 您可以使用 属性覆盖此默认行为并指定磁贴大小。You can override this default behavior and specify the tile size by using the property. 使用 属性来指定 是使用绝对坐标还是相对坐标。Use the property to specify whether the uses absolute or relative coordinates. 如果坐标是相对坐标，则它们相对于输出区域的大小。If the coordinates are relative, they are relative to the size of the output area. 点（0，0）表示输出区域的左上角，（1，1）表示输出区域的右下角。The point (0,0) represents the upper-left corner of the output area, and (1,1) represents the lower-right corner of the output area. 若要指定 属性使用绝对坐标，请将 属性设置为 ""。To specify that the property uses absolute coordinates, set the property to . 下图显示了将 的 属性设置为相对或绝对时的输出差异。The following illustration shows the difference in output when you set the property of a to either relative or absolute. ![绝对和相对视区单元](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "绝对和相对视区单位")![Absolute and Relative Viewport Units](~/add/media/absolute-and-relative-viewports.png "Absolute and Relative Viewport Units") 相对和绝对 System.windows.media.tilebrush.viewportunitsRelative and absolute ViewportUnits ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
